channel.title: CVE Feed for GitLab -- GitLab EE
channel.description: The latest CVEs for GitLab -- GitLab EE

item.title: CVE-2019-15582|2024-08-05T00:49:13.762Z -- gitlab -- gitlab%20ee
item.description: An IDOR was discovered in < 12.3.2, < 12.2.6, and < 12.1.12 for GitLab Community Edition (CE) and Enterprise Edition (EE) that allowed a maintainer to add any private group to a protected environment.

item.title: CVE-2019-15590|2024-08-05T00:49:13.635Z -- gitlab -- gitlab%20ee
item.description: An access control issue exists in < 12.3.5, < 12.2.8, and < 12.1.14 for GitLab Community Edition (CE) and Enterprise Edition (EE) where private merge requests and issues would be disclosed with the Group Search feature provided by Elasticsearch integration

item.title: CVE-2019-15581|2024-08-05T00:49:13.763Z -- gitlab -- gitlab%20ee
item.description: An IDOR exists in < 12.3.2, < 12.2.6, and < 12.1.12 for GitLab Community Edition (CE) and Enterprise Edition (EE) that allowed a project owner or maintainer to see the members of any private group via merge request approval rules.
